Package index

Data Download Functions

Functions to download air quality data from Turkish monitoring stations

download_air_quality_data()
Download Air Quality Data with Additional Objects
download_all_data_for_station()
Download All Available Data for a Given Station
bulk_download_air_quality_data()
Bulk Download Air Quality Data for All Stations

Station and Parameter Information

Functions to list available stations, cities, and measurement parameters

list_stations()
List Available Stations
list_cities()
List Available Cities
list_parameters()
List Available Measurement Parameters

Data Quality Assessment

Functions to assess data quality and identify issues

quality_report()
Generate Data Quality Report
assess_completeness()
Assess Data Completeness
identify_gaps()
Identify Time Gaps in Air Quality Data
check_invalid_values()
Check for Invalid Values in Air Quality Data
print(<air_quality_report>)
Print Method for Air Quality Report

API Diagnostics

Functions to test and diagnose API connectivity

test_api_connection()
Test API Connection
get_api_status()
Get API Status Information
print(<api_diagnostic>)
Print Method for API Diagnostic

Package Information

airqualitytr airqualitytr-package
airqualitytr: Turkish Air Quality Data Access Tools
